org.apache.logging.log4j.core.config.builder.api

Interface ComponentBuilder<T extends ComponentBuilder<T>>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The ComponentBuilder's own type for fluent APIs.
    All Superinterfaces:
    Builder<Component>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    AppenderComponentBuilder, AppenderRefComponentBuilder, CompositeFilterComponentBuilder, CustomLevelComponentBuilder, FilterableComponentBuilder<T>, FilterComponentBuilder, LayoutComponentBuilder, LoggableComponentBuilder<T>, LoggerComponentBuilder, RootLoggerComponentBuilder, ScriptComponentBuilder, ScriptFileComponentBuilder

    public interface ComponentBuilder<T extends ComponentBuilder<T>>
extends Builder<Component>
    Builds arbitrary components and is the base type for the provided components.
    Since:
    2.4

        T addComponent(ComponentBuilder<?> builder)
        Adds a sub component.

        Returns:

        Returns the name of the component, if any.
